name: DeleteStatusUpdate
description:
Delete a specific status update from Asana.

Use this tool to remove a specific status update in Asana by providing the status update's unique ID. This is useful for managing project updates and maintaining current information. The tool confirms successful deletion.

parameters.name: status_update_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the status update to be deleted.

parameters.name: pretty_output
parameters.description: If true, the response is formatted for readability with line breaks and indentation. This increases response size and time, so use for debugging.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.name: opt_pretty
parameters.description:

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
